_header: Some time in Greece that noble region
_description: Eight Goodly Questions (an expansion of part of ‘Septem Sapientium Sententiae’, by Ausonius) — nine stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC595.First Lines:
Sometyme in Grece that noble regionThere were eighte clerkis of
                    greate sciencePhilosophers of notable discretionOf whom was asked to
                    proue theire prudence…
CamTCC595.Last Lines:
…Sayinge had I venged all myne harmeMy cloke had not be furrid
                    half so warme
CamTCC595.Attributed Title: Eighte goodlie questions with theire aunswers (f. 1)

Banna.First Lines:
Quhylome in grece that nobill regiounThair dwelt awcht clerkis off
                    grit science…
Banna.Last Lines:
…He thinkis not how wysmen said beforneGod sendis a thrawart
                    cow a schort horne
